trans-unit.source: Provides user interface (UI) elements that enable a user to recover or reset a lost password and receive it in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用者介面 (UI) 項目，讓使用者復原或重設遺失的密碼，並接收電子郵件中。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Views](#views) - [Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The PasswordRecovery control assists users who have forgotten their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [檢視](#views) - [樣式和範本](#styles_and_templates) - [驗證群組](#validation_groupings) - [套用 CSS 樣式](#applying_styles) - [協助工具](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 簡介 Provider 控制可協助使用者忘記其密碼。

trans-unit.source: It enables a user to request an e-mail message containing either a new password or the password already associated with his or her user name.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓使用者要求包含新的密碼或密碼已與使用者名稱相關聯的電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The PasswordRecovery Web control uses Internet e-mail services to send recovered or new passwords to users.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Provider Web 控制項傳送給使用者的復原或新的密碼使用網際網路電子郵件服務。

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 沒有固有的安全性風險，傳送電子郵件中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: 您應該判斷是否可以接受您的網站將這些安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中可用的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)才能繼續。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Users can recover passwords only when the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property supports clear text or encrypted passwords.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以復原密碼，在定義成員資格提供者時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性支援純文字或加密的密碼。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because hashed passwords cannot be recovered, users at sites that use hashed passwords can only reset their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊的密碼無法復原，因為使用者站台上使用雜湊的密碼只能重設其密碼。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Accepting user input is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受使用者輸入可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords.
trans-unit.target: 惡意使用者可以傳送資料，目的是要公開的弱點可能會或執行程式，嘗試產生的密碼。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control.
trans-unit.target: 為了提高安全性，處理使用者輸入時，您應該使用您的控制項的驗證功能，並保護您的控制項設定的任何資料提供者。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Securing Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[保護的成員資格](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The PasswordRecovery control can be used when a membership user has not been approved (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `false`), but it cannot be used when a membership user has been locked out (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 尚未核准的成員資格使用者時，就可以使用 Provider 控制項 (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設`false`)，但不在成員資格使用者鎖定時使用 (<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設`true`)。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsApproved%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail message is sent using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件傳送使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: To be able to send e-mail to users, you must configure a mail server in your application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要能夠傳送電子郵件給使用者，您必須設定郵件伺服器應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: You can change the content of the e-mail sent to users by setting a custom message in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更的內容中設定自訂的訊息傳送給使用者的電子郵件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MailDefinition%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 並不保證會接收使用者，或檢視電子郵件訊息。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a notification by e-mail, consider providing a confirmation link in the message, allowing the user to confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認使用者已收到電子郵件通知，請考慮提供確認在訊息中，可讓使用者確認收到通知的連結。

trans-unit.source: ## Views The PasswordRecovery control has three states, or views: - UserName view -- Asks the user for his or her registered user name.
trans-unit.target: # # Provider 控制項有三個檢視表所述，或檢視︰ 檢視使用者名稱-會詢問使用者是否已註冊的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: - Question view -- Requires the user to provide the answer to a stored question to reset the password.
trans-unit.target: [問題] 檢視︰-需要使用者提供重設密碼的預存問題的答案。

trans-unit.source: - Success view -- Tells the user whether the password recovery or reset was successful.
trans-unit.target: 為順利完成檢視表-會告知使用者密碼復原或重設成功與否。

trans-unit.source: The PasswordRecovery control displays the Question view only when the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property supports password question and answer.
trans-unit.target: Provider 控制項會顯示 [問題] 檢視中定義的成員資格提供者時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性支援密碼問題和解答。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists each style property of the PasswordRecovery control and indicates which view it affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的每個樣式屬性 Provider 控制項，並指出這會影響檢視它。

trans-unit.source: |Property|UserName view|Question view|Success view| |--------------|-------------------|-------------------|------------------| ||Yes|Yes|Yes| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||No|No|Yes| ||Yes|Yes|No| ||Yes|Yes|Yes| ## Styles and Templates You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the PasswordRecovery control.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |使用者名稱檢視 |問題檢視 |順利完成檢視表 | |--------------|-------------------|-------------------|------------------| ||[是] |[是] |[是] | ||[是] |[是] |否 | ||[是] |[是] |否 | ||[是] |[是] |否 | ||[是] |[是] |否 | ||否 |否 |[是] | ||[是] |[是] |否 | ||[是] |[是] |[是] | # # 樣式和範本您可以使用一組廣泛的樣式屬性來自訂 Provider 控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the three views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將自訂的範本套用至三個檢視，如果您需要完全控制控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> properties to create templates for these views.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>屬性來建立這些檢視的範本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you define a template for a view, the style properties of PasswordRecovery have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果您定義檢視的範本，Provider 的樣式屬性會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the PasswordRecovery control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出 Provider 控制項的樣式屬性，並說明每個樣式屬性會影響哪些 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如需哪些屬性的每個樣式套用至清單，請參閱個別的樣式屬性的文件。

trans-unit.source: |Style property|UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>|Submit buttons on all views.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>|Error text displayed to the user.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>|Links to other pages.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>|Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>|Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>|Text entry input fields.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>|Title text for each view.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>|Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| The following table lists which template properties apply to each view in the PasswordRecovery control.
trans-unit.target: |樣式屬性 |受影響的 UI 項目 | |--------------------|-------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>|送出按鈕上的所有檢視。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>|對使用者顯示錯誤文字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>|連結至其他網頁。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>|告訴使用者如何使用控制項的頁面上的指示文字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>|所有輸入欄位，例如文字方塊的標籤。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>|輸入文字輸入欄位。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>|標題為每個檢視的文字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A>|密碼復原或重設嘗試成功時，對使用者顯示的文字。 | 下表的列出哪些範本屬性套用至 Provider 控制項中的每一個檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the controls that you must set in each template, see the documentation for the individual template properties.
trans-unit.target: 如需的控制項，您必須在每個範本中設定的清單，請參閱個別範本內容的文件。

trans-unit.source: |View|Template property| |----------|-----------------------| |UserName|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>| |Question|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>| |Success|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>| When the PasswordRecovery control is not customized with templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property of the PasswordRecovery control applies to the first text box in the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control.
trans-unit.target: |檢視 |樣板屬性 | |----------|-----------------------| |使用者名稱 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>| |問題 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>| |成功 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>| Provider 控制項未自訂範本，當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>Provider 控制項的屬性會套用至控制項中的第一個文字方塊和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>套用至所有文字方塊控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the PasswordRecovery control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Provider 控制項為自訂範本，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>屬性會被忽略。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control directly.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>屬性每個範本子控制項的直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: PasswordRecovery control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Provider 控制項屬性表示的文字方塊中，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A>，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Question%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.Answer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event triggered by the textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>文字方塊所觸發的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: ## Validation Groupings The PasswordRecovery control creates a validation group for all required field validators in the control so that other input controls on the page are not affected by validating the PasswordRecovery control.
trans-unit.target: # # 驗證群組 Provider 控制項建立的驗證群組控制項中的所有必要的欄位驗證程式，讓其他網頁上的輸入的控制項不會受到驗證 Provider 控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the PasswordRecovery control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>Provider 控制項的屬性做的驗證群組名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a PasswordRecovery control with the ID "PasswordRecovery1" will use a validation group name of "PasswordRecovery1".
trans-unit.target: 例如，Provider 控制項 id 」 PasswordRecovery1 」 將使用"PasswordRecovery1 」 的驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you want the PasswordRecovery control to participate in another validation group, you must template the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要參與驗證的另一個群組的 Provider 控制項，您必須將控制項樣板。

trans-unit.source: ## Applying CSS Styles The PasswordRecovery control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: # # 套用 CSS 樣式 Provider 控制可讓您在標記中指定的 CSS 樣式規則。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the PasswordRecovery control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用範本來自訂 Provider 控制項的外觀時，您可以指定範本中的標記中的 CSS 樣式。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，額外外部資料表不是必要的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以防止資料表呈現的設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.RenderOuterTable%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.RenderOuterTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有關如何設定這個控制項，使其產生標記，並符合協助工具標準，協助工具的資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                     ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法```                                                                                                                                                                                                                     ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: Gets the answer to the password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者所輸入的密碼復原確認問題的答案。

trans-unit.source: The Answer property contains the answer to the confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 回應屬性包含由使用者所輸入的確認問題的答案。

trans-unit.source: The Answer property is valid only after the page has been posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 頁面已張貼至伺服器之後，才回應內容無效。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The answer to the password recovery confirmation question entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入的密碼復原確認問題的答案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the label text for the password confirmation answer text box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定密碼確認解答文字方塊的標籤文字。

trans-unit.source: The AnswerLabelText property contains the label text for the password recovery confirmation answer text box.
trans-unit.target: AnswerLabelText 屬性包含密碼復原確認解答文字方塊的標籤文字。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text specified in the AnswerLabelText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>屬性，定義 AnswerLabelText 屬性中指定之文字的外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.LabelStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a template in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property, the AnswerLabelText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指派中的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>屬性，而 AnswerLabelText 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The label for the password confirmation answer text box.
trans-unit.target: 密碼確認解答文字方塊的標籤。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Answer:"
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 回應:"

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user enters an incorrect answer to the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者輸入錯誤密碼復原確認問題的答案。

trans-unit.source: The AnswerLookupError event is raised when the answer to the password recovery question is not validated by the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 密碼復原問題的答案不會驗證成員資格提供者中定義時，會引發 AnswerLookupError 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider does not support password recovery question and answer, the AnswerLookupError event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果成員資格提供者不支援密碼復原問題和解答，會永遠不會引發 AnswerLookupError 事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed to the user when the Answer text box is blank.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當解答文字方塊是空白時，對使用者顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The AnswerRequiredErrorMessage contains the error message to display in any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control on the same page as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: AnswerRequiredErrorMessage 包含要在任何中顯示的錯誤訊息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>與相同的頁面上的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the Answer text box is empty.
trans-unit.target: 解答文字方塊為空白時顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Answer."
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 回應 」。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of padding inside the borders of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線內填補的量<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value of the BorderPadding property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: BorderPadding 屬性的值儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control's border.
trans-unit.target: 之間的空間量 （以像素為單位） 的內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項的框線。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1。

trans-unit.source: The value of the BorderPadding property is set to less than -1.
trans-unit.target: BorderPadding 屬性的值設定為小於-1。

trans-unit.source: Creates the individual controls that make up the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 會建立個別控制項構成<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method creates instances of the controls that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control and creates default event handlers for their events.
trans-unit.target: CreateChildControls 方法會建立構成控制項的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制，並建立預設其事件的事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error text in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合所定義中的錯誤文字的外觀屬性的參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The FailureTextStyle property defines the appearance of error messages in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: FailureTextStyle 屬性定義錯誤訊息中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The FailureTextStyle property defines the appearance of the following properties: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> The style settings for the FailureTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: FailureTextStyle 屬性會定義下列屬性的外觀:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>FailureTextStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the FailureTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: FailureTextStyle 屬性中所做的任何設定覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> style properties are overridden by FailureTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the FailureTextStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>FailureTextStyle 設定樣式屬性會覆寫:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，FailureTextStyle 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of error text.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，其中包含屬性，定義的錯誤文字的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message to display when there is a problem with the membership provider for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示的成員資格提供者發生問題時的錯誤訊息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The GeneralFailureText property is displayed to the user when there is a problem with the membership provider that manages user information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 管理使用者資訊的成員資格提供者發生問題時，將會顯示給使用者的 GeneralFailureText 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the GeneralFailureText property is displayed when the membership provider cannot connect to the data store containing user information.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，成員資格提供者無法連線到資料存放區包含使用者資訊時，會顯示 GeneralFailureText 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A> property is displayed in the UserName view when the provider cannot find the specified user name in the database.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>提供者在資料庫中找不到指定的使用者名稱時，將會顯示在使用者檢視表的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A> property is displayed in the Question view when the answer entered by the user does not match the stored answer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>使用者輸入的回應不符合預存的回應時，將會顯示在 [問題] 檢視的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionFailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GeneralFailureText property is displayed for all other errors.
trans-unit.target: 對於所有其他錯誤，都會 GeneralFailureText 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the GeneralFailureText property is defined by the style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定所定義的 GeneralFailureText 屬性外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the GeneralFailureText property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the control ID set to "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 當您設定範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制，屬性會顯示在選擇性 GeneralFailureText<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制項設定為"FailureText"的控制項 ID。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the user's password will not be sent by e-mail because of a problem with the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用者的密碼將不會傳送電子郵件的成員資格提供者發生問題時顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your attempt to retrieve your password has failed.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 嘗試擷取您的密碼失敗。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 請再試一次。 」

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display next to the link to the Help page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示 [說明] 頁面的連結旁邊的影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image to display next to the link to the Help page.
trans-unit.target: 說明網頁的連結旁邊顯示的影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the link to the password recovery Help page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定密碼復原說明頁面之連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: The HelpPageText property contains the link text for the password recovery Help page.
trans-unit.target: HelpPageText 屬性包含密碼復原說明頁面的連結文字。

trans-unit.source: If a URL is specified in the HelpPageText property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays a link to information about password recovery in the UserName view and the Question view, but not in the Success view.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 HelpPageText 屬性中指定 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制會顯示在使用者名稱檢視和 問題 檢視中，但不是會在順利完成檢視表中的密碼復原的相關資訊的連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A> property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>, no link is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.String.Empty>，會顯示任何連結。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the Help page link is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: [說明] 連結的外觀由定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the HelpPageText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A> properties have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制，HelpPageText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A>屬性有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text of the link to the password recovery Help page.
trans-unit.target: 密碼復原說明頁面之連結的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the password recovery Help page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定密碼復原說明頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The HelpPageUrl property contains the URL of the password recovery Help page.
trans-unit.target: HelpPageUrl 屬性包含密碼復原說明頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays a link to the password recovery Help page in the UserName view and the Question view but not in the Success view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制會在密碼復原說明頁面使用者名稱 檢視和 問題 檢視中，但不是在 成功 檢視中顯示的連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageText%2A> property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>, no link is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageText%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.String.Empty>，會顯示任何連結。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HelpPageText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the Help page link is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: [說明] 連結的外觀由定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.HyperLinkStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider used to look up user information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來查詢使用者資訊的成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: The MembershipProvider property identifies the membership provider used to verify user information entered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: MembershipProvider 屬性識別用來驗證輸入中的使用者資訊的成員資格提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the <`membership`> section.
trans-unit.target: 中的 Web.config 檔案中所定義的成員資格提供者`membership`> 一節。

trans-unit.source: Setting the MembershipProvider property will change the provider used.
trans-unit.target: 設定 MembershipProvider 屬性將會變更使用的提供者。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the MembershipProvider property, it will always return <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定 MembershipProvider 屬性，它一定會傳回<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The membership provider used to look up user information.
trans-unit.target: 用來查詢使用者資訊的成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnAnswerLookupError method is called when the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者的密碼復原確認問題的答案不符合儲存在網站上的資料存放區中的答案，稱為 OnAnswerLookupError 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError> event.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLookupError>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.target: OnAnswerLookupError 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要將伺服器控制項的事件傳遞設定頁面的 UI 伺服器控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>物件，其中包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已取消。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 實作基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnSendingMail method is called after the membership provider has verified that the user is a valid member of the Web site and before the recovered or new password is e-mailed to the user.
trans-unit.target: OnSendingMail 方法是在之後的成員資格提供者已驗證使用者是有效的成員的網站和電子郵件傳送給使用者復原或新密碼之前呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The OnSendingMail method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSendingMail 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError"></xref> event when an e-mail message cannot be sent to the user.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError"></xref>事件時無法傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者。

trans-unit.source: The OnSendMailError method is called when the SMTP Mail service throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 郵件服務擲回例外狀況時，會呼叫 OnSendMailError 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> error and, if the exception is not handled, rethrows the exception while maintaining the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>錯誤和未處理例外狀況，如果重新擲回的例外狀況，同時維持呼叫堆疊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>物件傳遞為`e`參數，來判斷實際造成例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: During development, the most common reason that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError> event is raised is that the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 在開發期間，最常見原因，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>引發事件`<smtpMail>`Web.config 檔案區段不正確。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendMailError>

trans-unit.source: After deployment, this event can occur for a variety of reasons, most having to do with errors in an email address.
trans-unit.target: 部署之後，有許多原因，多數都有電子郵件地址中的錯誤可能會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true` to signal that the exception has been handled; otherwise, the exception is thrown again.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>物件的屬性做為傳遞`e`參數`true`發出信號的例外狀況已處理，否則會重新擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnUserLookupError method is called when the membership provider is unable to find the user name entered on the initial screen.
trans-unit.target: 找不到初始畫面上輸入的使用者名稱的成員資格提供者時，會呼叫 OnUserLookupError 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError> event.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserLookupError>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnVerifyingAnswer method is called before the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question is sent to the membership provider to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 之前在使用者回答密碼復原確認問題時，會傳送至成員資格提供者上，以驗證呼叫 OnVerifyingAnswer 方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer> event.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingAnswer>

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnVerifyingUser method is called after the user submits a user name on the initial screen and before the user name is validated by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: OnVerifyingUser 方法是在使用者提交的使用者名稱，在初始畫面上，成員資格提供者所驗證的使用者名稱之前之後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser> event.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.VerifyingUser>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.target: OnVerifyingUser 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the password recovery confirmation question established by the user on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者在網站上所建立的密碼復原確認問題。

trans-unit.source: The Question property contains the password recovery confirmation question that the user previously established on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 問題屬性包含在網站上先前建立的使用者的密碼復原確認問題。

trans-unit.source: The Question property is displayed only in the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 問題屬性只會顯示在 [問題] 檢視。

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property does not support password question and answer, the Question view is not displayed and the Question property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的成員資格提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性不支援密碼問題和解答，[問題] 檢視不會顯示問題屬性不使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The membership provider returns the question only after the user enters a valid user name.
trans-unit.target: 只有在使用者輸入有效的使用者名稱之後，成員資格提供者會傳回問題。

trans-unit.source: Until the user enters a valid user name, the Question property is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入有效的使用者名稱，直到問題屬性為<xref:System.String.Empty>。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the Question property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>屬性定義問題屬性的外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property to define the appearance of the Question view, the Question property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "Question".
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>屬性來定義外觀的 [問題] 檢視中，[問題] 屬性會顯示在選擇性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性設定為 「 問題 」。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 密碼復原確認問題。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在使用者回答密碼復原確認問題與答案的網站資料存放區中不相符時顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The QuestionFailureText property contains the error message that is displayed when the answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: QuestionFailureText 屬性包含密碼復原確認問題的答案不符合儲存在網站上的資料存放區中的回應時，會顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the QuestionFailureText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性定義 QuestionFailureText 屬性的外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the QuestionFailureText property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制，屬性會顯示在選擇性 QuestionFailureText<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性設定為"FailureText"。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display when the user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question does not match the answer stored in the Web site data store.
trans-unit.target: 要在使用者回答密碼復原確認問題與答案的網站資料存放區中不相符時顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Your answer could not be verified.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 無法驗證您的答案。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 請再試一次。 」

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the Question view to instruct the user to answer the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要以指示使用者回答密碼復原確認問題的 [問題] 檢視中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The QuestionInstructionText property is displayed in Question view to instruct the user to answer the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: QuestionInstructionText 屬性會顯示在 [問題] 檢視以指示使用者回答密碼復原確認問題。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the QuestionInstructionText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>屬性定義 QuestionInstructionText 屬性的外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.InstructionTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property to define the appearance of the Question view, the QuestionInstructionText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>定義 [問題] 檢視中，QuestionInstructionText 屬性外觀屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The instruction text to display in the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 要在 [問題] 檢視中顯示的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Answer the following question to receive your password."

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the Question view template.

trans-unit.source: |ID or Command name|Control type|Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Answer`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>.|Required| |`Submit`|Any control that causes event bubbling.|Optional| The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.
trans-unit.target: | 識別碼或命令名稱 |控制項類型 |必要/選用 | |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Answer`|實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>任何控制項。 |需要 | |`Submit`|任何控制項，會導致事件反昇。 |選擇性 | 送出控制項可以是任何控制項之事件反昇，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>

trans-unit.target: 寫入<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl"></xref>內容寫入指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>物件，以顯示在用戶端上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered output.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>接收轉譯的輸出。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control encloses rendered HTML in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element in order to apply inline styles.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否含括在轉譯的 HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref>才能套用內嵌樣式的項目。

trans-unit.source: In order to make inline style properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓內嵌樣式屬性，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>套用到所有的轉譯控制項的 HTML，ASP.NET 含括在轉譯的 HTML`table`項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想外部`table`要呈現的項目會將此屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，如果您嘗試設定內嵌套用至整個控制項的樣式屬性，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control encloses rendered HTML in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項含括在轉譯的 HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref>項目，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器的時間後發生的狀態變更的任何伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回伺服器控制項的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項相關聯的狀態，則這個方法會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 儲存後已修改的任何狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>叫用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含目前檢視狀態的控制項。否則，如果沒有與控制項相關聯的檢視狀態<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user is sent a password in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 使用者電子郵件傳送密碼之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The SendingMail event occurs on the server after the user requests a new or recovered password and submits a correct answer to the password confirmation question (if your membership provider supports password question and answer), but before the password is sent to the user in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 使用者要求新的或復原密碼，並提交密碼確認問題 （如果您的成員資格提供者支援密碼問題和解答），正確答案之後，但密碼傳送給使用者的電子郵件之前，就會在伺服器上發生 SendingMail 事件。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to do any special processing required before sending the e-mail message, such as setting <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件執行任何特殊處理，必須先傳送電子郵件訊息，例如設定<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>

trans-unit.source: After the user enters a valid user name and, if relevant, a valid answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control raises the SendingMail event, and then sends the password information to the user in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入有效的使用者名稱之後，如果相關，有效的回應，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項引發 SendingMail 事件，然後再將密碼資訊傳送給使用者的電子郵件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail uses the settings defined in the `<smtpMail>` configuration file element.
trans-unit.target: 電子郵件使用中定義的設定`<smtpMail>`組態檔元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the SMTP Mail system throws an error while attempting to send an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 發生於嘗試傳送電子郵件的 SMTP 郵件系統擲回的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The SendMailError event is raised when the SMTP mail server throws an exception when trying to send an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 郵件伺服器在嘗試傳送電子郵件時，會擲回例外狀況時，會引發 SendMailError 事件。

trans-unit.source: The default SendMailError event does not handle the SMTP error from the mail system.
trans-unit.target: 預設 SendMailError 事件不會處理的郵件系統的 SMTP 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The method that handles the SendMailError event must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object to `true` to handle the error and prevent it from being displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 處理 SendMailError 事件的方法，必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>物件`true`來處理錯誤，並防止顯示給使用者。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: If you use a template with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, you must use this command name for the action performed to submit the form or the control will not function properly.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use as the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要做為 [提交] 按鈕的影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The SubmitButtonImageUrl property contains the URL of the image to use for the Submit button when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonImageUrl 屬性包含影像的 URL，使用送出按鈕時的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property is used as the alternative text for the image in browsers that do not display images.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>屬性作為替代文字不會顯示映像的瀏覽器中的映像。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> property, the SubmitButtonImageUrl property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A>屬性，而 SubmitButtonImageUrl 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the image to use as the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 做為 [提交] 按鈕的影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of Submit buttons in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得定義在送出按鈕的外觀屬性集合的參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The SubmitButtonStyle property defines the appearance of Submit buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonStyle 屬性定義中送出按鈕的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the SubmitButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the SubmitButtonStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonStyle 屬性中所做的任何設定覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> properties are overridden by SubmitButtonStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> When you use templates to define the appearance of the initial or Question view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the SubmitButtonStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>SubmitButtonStyle 設定會覆寫屬性:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>當您使用範本來定義初始的外觀或問題檢視的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，SubmitButtonStyle 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of the Submit buttons.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> ，其中包含定義送出按鈕的外觀的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the button that submits the form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表單送出按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: The SubmitButtonText property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's Submit button.
trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonText 屬性包含顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項的 [提交] 按鈕。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: How the SubmitButtonText property is used depends on the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如何使用 SubmitButtonText 屬性取決於設定的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the SubmitButtonText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，SubmitButtonText 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 預設為"Submit"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of Submit button to use when rendering the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於轉譯時送出按鈕的型別<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonType 屬性可讓您決定何種按鈕用來提交項目，以<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>屬性會提供按鈕的文字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|在 儲存位置的映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>屬性提供影像的替代文字。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>|HTML 連結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A> property provides the link text.| When you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control, the SubmitButtonType property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>屬性提供的連結文字。 | 當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，SubmitButtonType 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SubmitButtonText%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: SubmitButtonType 屬性未設定為有效<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page to display after sending a password successfully.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面的 URL，在成功傳送密碼後顯示。

trans-unit.source: The SuccessPageUrl property contains the URL of the page that is displayed after a password has successfully been sent to a user.
trans-unit.target: SuccessPageUrl 屬性包含密碼已成功傳送給使用者之後，會顯示網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If the SuccessPageUrl property is not `null`, the user is directed to the page defined in the SuccessPageUrl property; otherwise, the page containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SuccessPageUrl 屬性不是`null`，使用者會導向至 [SuccessPageUrl 屬性中定義] 頁面上，否則頁面包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制重新整理。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the password success page.
trans-unit.target: 密碼成功頁面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示 [成功] 檢視的範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。
