trans-unit.target: SuccessTemplate 屬性包含範本定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>順利完成檢視表中的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: There are no required or optional fields for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> Success view template.
trans-unit.target: 沒有必要或選用的欄位，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>成功檢視範本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: When you use a template to define the appearance of the Success view, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - All properties inherited from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> (see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control members table).
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義順利完成檢視表的外觀時，只有下列屬性會影響控制項的行為:-所有屬性都繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>(請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制成員資料表)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在成功傳送密碼之後顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The SuccessText property is displayed in the Success view when a password has been successfully sent to a user.
trans-unit.target: 密碼已成功傳送給使用者時，會顯示 [成功] 檢視中 SuccessText 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the SuccessText property.

trans-unit.source: When you use a template assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A> property, the SuccessText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用的範本指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>屬性，而 SuccessText 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property is not `null`, the user is redirected to the page defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's Success view is not shown to the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>屬性不是`null`，使用者重新導向至網頁中定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>屬性，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項的順利完成檢視表不會顯示給使用者。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SuccessPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display when a password has been successfully sent.
trans-unit.target: 已成功傳送密碼時顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your password has been sent to you."
trans-unit.target: 預設值是"您的密碼已傳送給您。 」

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of style properties that define the appearance of text displayed in the Success view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合所定義的 [成功] 檢視中顯示的文字的外觀樣式屬性參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The SuccessTextStyle property defines the appearance of text in the Success view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SuccessTextStyle 屬性的 [成功] 檢視中定義的文字外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `SuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `SuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the SuccessTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SuccessTextStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the SuccessTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: SuccessTextStyle 屬性中所做的任何設定覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>SuccessTextStyle 設定會覆寫屬性:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>當您使用範本來定義 [成功] 檢視的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，SuccessTextStyle 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The TextLayout property specifies where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays the field labels for the Answer, Question, and User Name text boxes.
trans-unit.target: TextLayout 屬性指定的位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項會顯示回應、 Question 和使用者名稱的文字方塊中的欄位標籤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: When the TextLayout property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout> (the default), the field labels appear to the left of the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: 當 TextLayout 屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>（預設值），欄位標籤會顯示在左邊的文字方塊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>

trans-unit.target: 當 TextLayout 設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>，欄位標籤出現的文字方塊上方。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginTextLayout>

trans-unit.source: The text of the labels is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.AnswerLabelText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.QuestionLabelText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameLabelText%2A> properties, respectively.

trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>TitleTextStyle 設定會覆寫屬性:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A>當您使用範本來定義外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項，TitleTextStyle 屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of title text in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，其中包含屬性，定義標題中的文字外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Implements the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the membership provider cannot find the user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格提供者找不到由使用者所輸入的使用者名稱時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The UserLookupError event is raised when the membership provider cannot find the user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格提供者找不到由使用者所輸入的使用者名稱時，會引發 UserLookupError 事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears in the User Name text box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在使用者名稱 文字方塊中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The UserName property contains the user name entered by the user, or <xref:System.String> if the user has not entered a name.
trans-unit.target: UserName 屬性包含由使用者所輸入的使用者名稱或<xref:System.String>如果使用者未輸入名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The UserName property is used only in the UserName view.
trans-unit.target: UserName 屬性只能用於使用者檢視表。

trans-unit.source: The UserName property is saved in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control's control state to preserve the values between round trips to the server even when view state is turned off for the page.
trans-unit.target: UserName 屬性儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項的控制項狀態，以保留之間來回伺服器的檢視狀態頁面時，已關閉，即使值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control properties represented by text boxes, such as UserName, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>文字方塊中，例如使用者名稱、 所代表的控制項屬性都可存取的頁面生命週期的所有階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event triggered by the textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用者所做的任何變更會採用控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>文字方塊所觸發的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the UserName property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>屬性的文字外觀的屬性中定義的使用者名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TextBoxStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a template to the UserName property to display the UserName view, the UserName property is assigned the value entered in a required <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "UserName".
trans-unit.target: 當您將範本指派給要顯示使用者檢視表的使用者名稱屬性時，指派的使用者名稱屬性中必要輸入的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性設定為"UserName"。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed when the user name entered by the user is not a valid user name for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當使用者輸入使用者名稱不是有效的使用者名稱的網站時所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The UserNameFailureText property contains the error message that is displayed when the user enters a user name that is not recognized by the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: UserNameFailureText 屬性包含使用者輸入中定義的成員資格提供者無法辨識的使用者名稱時，會顯示錯誤訊息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the UserNameFailureText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>屬性 UserNameFailureText 屬性中定義的文字外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.FailureTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a template to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> property, the UserNameFailureText property is displayed in an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set to "FailureText".
trans-unit.target: 當您指派的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>屬性，屬性會顯示在選擇性 UserNameFailureText<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>屬性設定為"FailureText"。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.source: The text displayed when the user name entered by the user is not a valid user name for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入使用者名稱不是有效的使用者名稱的網站時顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is "We were unable to access your information.

trans-unit.source: Please try again."

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the UserName view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示的使用者名稱檢視的範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The UserNameTemplate property contains the template that defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control in UserName view.
trans-unit.target: UserNameTemplate 屬性包含範本定義的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>使用者檢視表中的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the UserName view template.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出必要和選擇性使用的控制項中的使用者名稱檢視範本。

trans-unit.source: |ID or Command name|Control type|Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|Any control that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>.|Optional| |`Submit`|Any control that causes event bubbling.|Optional| The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.
trans-unit.target: | 識別碼或命令名稱 |控制項類型 |必要/選用 | |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>任何控制項。 |選擇性 | |`Submit`|任何控制項，會導致事件反昇。 |選擇性 | 送出控制項可以是任何控制項之事件反昇，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>

trans-unit.source: The control's `CommandName` property must be set to "Submit".
trans-unit.target: 控制項的`CommandName`屬性必須設定為"Submit"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control throws an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception if the UserName view does not contain the required controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制會擲回<xref:System.Web.HttpException>例外狀況，如果使用者檢視表不包含必要的控制項。</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供的選擇性控制識別碼至錯誤的類型; 的控制項，會擲不回任何例外狀況不過，如果控制項之後忽略由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: When you use a template to define the appearance of the UserName view, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - All properties inherited from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> (see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control members table).
trans-unit.target: 當您使用範本來定義使用者檢視表的外觀時，只有下列屬性會影響控制項的行為:-所有屬性都繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>(請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制成員資料表)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameFailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other properties are inactive when you use a template for the UserName view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他屬性為非使用中，當您使用的使用者檢視表的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the template for displaying the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control in UserName view.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含顯示範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>使用者檢視表中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control used to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate*> template.
trans-unit.target: 取得容器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>用來建立的執行個體控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate*>範本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: This property provides programmatic access to child controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供以程式設計方式存取子控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to programmatically access child controls when using a template.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來以程式設計方式存取子控制項，當使用範本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title for the UserName view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者檢視表的標題<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The UserNameTitleText property contains the text to display as the title of the UserName view, which asks the user to enter his or her user name.
trans-unit.target: UserNameTitleText 屬性包含要顯示為使用者檢視表，其中會要求使用者輸入使用者名稱的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A> property define the appearance of the text in the UserNameTitleText property.
trans-unit.target: 中的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>屬性 UserNameTitleText 屬性中定義的文字外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.TitleTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A> property to define the appearance of the UserName view, the UserNameTitleText property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>定義使用者檢視表 UserNameTitleText 屬性外觀屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.UserNameTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的預設文字會根據伺服器的地區設定來當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The title for the UserName view.
trans-unit.target: 使用者名稱檢視的標題。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Forgot Your Password?"
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 忘記密碼？ 」

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> properties that define the appearance of error messages that are associated with any input validation used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>定義與任何相關聯的錯誤訊息的外觀屬性輸入所使用的驗證<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ValidatorTextStyle property defines the appearance of validation error messages in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: ValidatorTextStyle 屬性定義的驗證錯誤訊息中出現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以宣告方式設定這些屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`代表的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>類別 (例如， `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在表單中，以程式設計方式設定屬性`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 一般設定包括自訂背景色彩、 文字色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the ValidatorTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: ValidatorTextStyle 屬性的樣式設定會與樣式設定合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: Any settings made in the ValidatorTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control.
trans-unit.target: ValidatorTextStyle 屬性中所做的任何設定覆寫屬性中的對應設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that defines the appearance of error messages that are associated with any input validation used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>定義會與所使用的任何輸入驗證相關聯的錯誤訊息的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user has submitted an answer to the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者已送出密碼復原確認問題的解答。

trans-unit.source: The VerifyingAnswer event occurs on the server after the user submits the answer to the password confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: 使用者送出密碼確認問題的答案之後，就會在伺服器上發生 VerifyingAnswer 事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prepare the answer submitted by the user for the membership provider, for example by converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters.
trans-unit.target: 若要準備送出的解答使用者的成員資格提供者，例如將其轉換成全為大寫或小寫字母，您可以使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control first raises the VerifyingAnswer event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property to compare the answer entered by the user with the password stored in the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項第一次引發 VerifyingAnswer 事件，然後使用成員資格提供者中指定與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>要比較的使用者輸入的密碼儲存在網站中的答案。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user name is validated by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格提供者所驗證的使用者名稱之前，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The VerifyingUser event is raised on the server before the user name is submitted to the membership provider to determine whether the user name is valid.
trans-unit.target: VerifyingUser 引發伺服器上的使用者名稱提交給成員資格提供者，以判斷是否為有效的使用者名稱之前。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform any preprocessing needed on the user name, such as converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters, or verifying that the user name is in a particular format, such as an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件執行任何所需的使用者名稱，例如將其轉換成全為大寫或小寫字母，或正在驗證的使用者名稱為特定的格式，例如電子郵件地址的前置處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control first raises the VerifyingUser event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> property to determine whether the user name entered is a valid user name for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項第一次引發 VerifyingUser 事件，然後使用成員資格提供者中指定與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性，以判斷輸入的使用者名稱是否為有效的使用者名稱的網站。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: If it is valid, and the membership provider supports password question and answer, the password verification question is returned from the Web site and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> control displays the Question view.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是有效的而且成員資格提供者支援密碼問題和解答，密碼驗證問題會傳回從網站和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>控制項會顯示 [問題] 檢視。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>

trans-unit.source: If the user name is not valid, the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A> property is displayed in the UserName view so that the user can enter a different user name.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者名稱不是有效的在文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>屬性會顯示在使用者檢視表中，以便使用者可以輸入不同的使用者名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.GeneralFailureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider does not support password question and answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail> event is raised and e-mail is sent to the user with the new or recovered password.
trans-unit.target: 如果成員資格提供者不支援密碼問題和解答，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>就會引發事件和電子郵件傳送給使用者以新的或已復原的密碼。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery.SendingMail>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
